CustomField.formula: IF ( OR (ISBLANK( Renewal_Annual_Premium__c ), Renewal_Annual_Premium__c =0) , Quoted_Annual_Premium__c / Current_Annual_Premium__c , Quoted_Annual_Premium__c / Renewal_Annual_Premium__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Renewal Premium is populated, Quoted/Renewal Premium. If not, Quoted/Current Premium.
CustomField.label: Quoted Ratio
